title: @KateyKhaos Question about seasonal ward skins.
body:
So when we unlock Team ranked ward skins, why dont we acquire all of it?

Like at 25 points you get the simple shield, at 50 you get the sword and shield, at 75 we get the sword shield and helmet ward skin.  

Why don't people who reach 75 get all 3?

replies.body: This reward is meant to be something that's leveled up, as opposed to just collected. As you earn more points, you level up the ward, which is why ear tier has bits added to it.
